title: Network Admin Explains Why StarTech Adapters Just Work - StarTech.com
description:
Why StarTech.com Adapters? They Just Work.

Why does this Network Administrator always keep StarTech.com adapters handy?

“For whatever type of connection you need to make, they have a product which can fit your need. I carry three or four of their adapters every day, and without those, in a lot of situations, I couldn’t do my job.”

Learn more about the products featured in this video and other display adapters: https://www.startech.com/display-adapters
